thread.title: Skeleton World Championships: Lizzy Yarnold third going into final run - BBC Sport
thread.title_full: Skeleton World Championships: Lizzy Yarnold third going into final run - BBC Sport

title: Skeleton World Championships: Lizzy Yarnold third going into final run - BBC Sport
text:
Yarnold is 0.09 seconds behind second-placed Tina Hermann of Germany Bobsleigh & Skeleton World Championships Venue: Konigssee, Germany Date: 17-26 February Coverage: Live coverage on Connected TV, BBC Red Button and the BBC Sport website Olympic champion Lizzy Yarnold moved into third place after the first of Saturday's two runs at the Skeleton World Championships in Germany. 
The Briton was fourth after Friday's opening day with the second of the day's two runs in Konigssee abandoned because of snow. 
But she was fastest in heat two on Saturday and trails leader Jacqueline Loelling of Germany by 0.24 seconds. 
The final run starts at 09:30 GMT with Yarnold third last to go. Share this page
